Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Wringer \Wring"er\, n. 1. One who, or that which, wrings; hence, an extortioner. [1913 Webster]
2. A machine for pressing water out of anything, particularly from clothes after they have been washed. [1913 Webster]
wringer n : a clothes dryer consisting of two roles between which the wet clothes are squeezed
